generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with lane markings, extending from the foreground into the distance, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: Pedestrians are visible on a paved area next to the road, which is delineated by curbs and poles, indicating it is a sidewalk.
- building: Several multi-story structures with windows are visible in the background, which are buildings.
- wall: A stone wall is visible on the right side of the image, which is a wall.
- pole: Multiple vertical poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs, which are poles.
- traffic light: Red traffic lights are visible at the intersection, which are traffic lights.
- traffic sign: A triangular warning sign and a circular blue sign with an arrow are visible, which are traffic signs.
- vegetation: Several trees are visible in the background and along the sidewalk, which are vegetation.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings and trees, which is sky.
- person: Several individuals are visible walking on the sidewalk and crossing the street, which are persons.
- bus: Two large public transport buses are visible on the road, which are buses.
